document_data.name: Ko Lei Kho
document_data.mainbody: '''Ko Lei Kho''' was the [[shou]] governor of [[Akari]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: Ko Lei Kho was a member of mercantile [[Ko clan]] that led the first colony in Akari. He ruled from [[Tai Ko]] town. The colony prospered until in 1357 the settlers started to being terrorized by [[ochimo]]. He asked help to his clan and [[Ko Mei Kho]] send him an adventuring party to resolve the matter.
document_data.Personality: Lei Kho was always suspicious of all, modest and self-effacing.
